Localization.Name: Lamb Tagine Combat Ration
Localization.Description:
NDR: 80
Effects: Hypertrophic, Hypo-Metabolic, Cognitive Boosting

A full meal combat ration specially formulated to provide complete high-performance nutrition for UEE Army personnel.
